code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Stocks(){const[stockId,setStockId]=useState("");const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const fetchStock=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("/api/stocks/".concat(stockId));const data=await response.json();setResult(data);}catch(error){setResult({error:"No se pudo obtener la información del stock."});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Selecciona tu Stock"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:stockId,onChange:e=>setStockId(e.target.value),placeholder:"ID del Stock"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchStock,children:"Consultar"}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(result,null,2)})]});}export default Stocks;
